DOC.brief_summary: Compare the changes of regional cerebral oxygen saturation during midazolam or dexmedetomidine sedation for spinal anesthesia in the elderly patients who undergoing femur surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Sedatives on Regional Cerebral Oxygen Saturation
DOC.detailed_description: Compare the changes of regional cerebral oxygen saturation during midazolam or dexmedetomidine administration (target bispectrl index 75-80) for spinal anesthesia in the elderly patients over 65 years who undergoing femur surgery.
DOC.criteria: patinets who undergoing femur surgery under spinal anesthesia previous cerebrovascular disease, uncontrolled cardiovascular disorder, uncontrolled pulmonary disease
